tossup_question: 9) EARTH AND SPACE  What are particles in the air onto which water vapor condense on called?
bonus_question: 9) EARTH AND SPACE  Which of the following is not true about continental volcanic arcs
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) They form around subduction zones
X) They are typically formed from plutons
Y) They are created by intraplate volcanism
Z) They form tall volcanoes
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Y) They are created by intraplate volcanism
